## Color3.LerpToRef() method

Creates a new Color3 with values linearly interpolated of "amount" between the start Color3 and the end Color3

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static LerpToRef(left: Color3, right: Color3, amount: number, result: Color3): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  left | <code>Color3</code> | defines the start value |
|  right | <code>Color3</code> | defines the end value |
|  amount | <code>number</code> | defines the gradient factor |
|  result | <code>Color3</code> | defines the Color3 object where to store the result |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
